Query type

data LuceneQuery Source

A Lucene query.

Query construction

(=:) :: Text -> LuceneExpr a -> LuceneQuery infix 4 Source

A field query.

Example:

-- foo:bar
query :: LuceneQuery
query = "foo" =: word "bar"

(&&:) :: LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery infixr 3 Source

An AND query.

Example:

-- foo:bar AND baz:qux
query :: LuceneQuery
query =
      "foo" =: word "bar"
  &&: "baz" =: word "qux"

(||:) :: LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery infixr 2 Source

An OR query.

Example:

-- foo:bar OR baz:qux
query :: LuceneQuery
query =
      "foo" =: word "bar"
  ||: "baz" =: word "qux"

(-:) :: LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery -> LuceneQuery infixr 1 Source

A NOT query.

Example:

-- foo:bar NOT baz:qux
query :: LuceneQuery
query =
     "foo" =: word "bar"
  -: "baz" =: word "qux"

Query compilation

compileLuceneQuery :: LuceneQuery -> ByteString Source

Compile a Lucene query to a ByteString. Because the underlying Lucene expressions are correct by construction, this function is total.
